item.title: The evolution of modern music
item.description: Are you curiousÂ about the origins of some music genres? Well, I was too. That’s why I invested many hours reading Wikipedia and created this – in the meantime pretty comprehensive – diagram with Lucidchart. Please let me know, if you find an error or you think that an important genre is missing.
